    <script type="text/javascript">
        var nbElem = document.getElementsByClassName('order_by')[0].children.length;
        var indexSelected = 0;
        for (var i = 0; i < nbElem; i++) {
            console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('order_by')[0].children[i].children[0].dataset.period);
            if ('week' == document.getElementsByClassName('order_by')[0].children[i].children[0].dataset.period) {
                indexSelected = i;
                break;
            }
        }
        document.getElementsByClassName('order_by')[0].children[indexSelected].children[0].className = 'selected';
    </script>

        <script src="//cdn2-gulli.ladmedia.fr/js/compiled/scrollload.min.js" defer="defer"></script>
